Common.UnitFloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: The Vault - 9th Floor - 3,608 SF - Hypo LL Demo Plan

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The building offers excellent access to 17th & Champa, and is minutes from several major thoroughfares.

• Two blocks from Federal Courthouse
• At the corner of 17th & Champa
• In the center of Denver’s downtown financial district
• One block 16th Street Pedestrian Mall and the Free Mall Ride Shuttle
• One block from RTD Light rail station
• Colorado Business Bank located on the main floor/lobby of building

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Vault is an iconic and historic building located at 17th Street/Champa in downtown Denver offering flexible floor plates, including highly improved spaces on the upper floors which are well suited to tech, creative, financial services, and law firm tenants. The ground floor is ideal for innovative food and beverage retailers, and features a grand lobby heralded as one of the top historic lobbies in city, along with large historic vaults on the lower level which can be unlocked for further potential. Tenants enjoy the best of the city's original business district and the nearby 16th Street Pedestrian Mall ($150M renovation underway) with over 40 cafes/restaurants, two dozen shops, as well as a MallRide shuttle bus and light rail station.
